name: Mr.Pigs Rampage DEMO
description:
This game is my current favorite of all the games I've made. I had a ton of fun making it and I hope you enjoy! I will be making a full game most likely and maybe putting it on steam if I can manage to get enough money for the fee ($100). Thanks! Updates might come!

NOTICE: This is just a demo to show some mechanics that I will most likely have in the full game and the full game will have much more mechanics and a full world!
